Bio: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the full before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.
name: Anand

Bio: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.
name: Drishyam

Bio: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.
name: Nayakan

Bio: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.
name: AnbeSivam

Bio: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.
name: GolMaal

Bio: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.
name: VikramVedha

Bio: Black Friday is a film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.
name: BlackFriday

Bio: Constant rejections in his attempts to become a filmmaker and family constraints force Arun to let go of his dream and take up the job of a Police officer.
name: Ratsasan
